name: Shove 'N' Blast
description:
**PLEASE READ: Though the web version is provided for convenience, I recommend playing the executable version for optimal performance, as the web version is prone to slowdowns and misrendering shaders.**

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, with the theme: "Joined Together"

One character is capable of shooting a deadly laser that vaporizes enemies, but can not maneuver whiling charging.
The other character can shove enemies and freeze them in place, but can not outright kill the enemies.

These two work together, combining their strengths to overcome each other's shortcomings, to form the perfect team.

CONTROLS:
Arrow Keys - Movement
SPACE / ENTER - Charge Laser (for 3 seconds)
SPACE /ENTER (once laser is charged) - Launch Laser
Z - Freeze Enemies for 10 seconds
X - Shove Enemies
F11 - Toggle Fullscreen
ESC - Exit Fullscreen / Game
